item.title: Basic Mechanisms
item.description: Basic Mechanism Examples: Contour Filter Panel for the contour filter Python scripting

item.title: Data Objects
item.description: Data Object Examples: Creation of Contours Contour interpolation 2D and 3D visualization of contours Annotation of images Contours and ghosting Distance between markers Creation of WEMs Processing and modification of WEMs Interactively moving WEM WEM - Primitive Value Lists

item.title: Open Inventor
item.description: Open Inventor Examples: Open Inventor objects Mouse interactions in an Open Inventor scene

item.title: Visualization Examples
item.description: Visualization Examples: Synchronous view of two images Creating a magnifier Image overlays Display images converted to Open Inventor scene objects Volume rendering and interactions

item.title: Example 1: Contour Filter
item.description: Example 1: Contour Filter This example shows how to create a contour filter. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Example 1: Panel for the contour filter
item.description: Example 1: Panel for the contour filter This example contains a whole package structure. Inside you can find the example contour filter for which a panel was created. Download You can download the example network here

item.title: Example 2: Python scripting
item.description: Example 2: Python scripting This example shows how to create module interactions via Python scripting. Download The files need to be added to a package. You can download the example network here
